20110119020417.000|20110119020419.000|CC1|MANY WERE UPSET, THEY COMPLAINED
20110119020419.000|20110119020420.000|CC1|THEY WERE LEFT OUT OF THE LOOP

20110119020426.000|20110119020428.000|CC1|PHONES, SO THEY DIALED THEM UP, 
20110119020428.000|20110119020431.000|CC1|OR SENT THEM TEXT MESSAGES.

20110119020631.000|20110119020633.000|CC1|THERE ARE STILL MANY UNANSWERED 
20110119020633.000|20110119020634.000|CC1|QUESTIONS TONIGHT, AMONG THEM
